DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Prompt: Please enter a d{d} value (1 to {d})
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.PromptInvalid: Invalid input. Please enter a d{d} value (1 to {d})
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Force_Hint: (requires reload) Force everyone to use manual rolls.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Flagged_Hint: Add a flag to chat rolls that use manual dice.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Enabled_Hint: Enter rolls manually instead of using Foundry's random roll calculator.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Rollback_Hint: When enabled, cancelling the prompt will instead perform a regular roll with Foundry.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Flavour5e_Name: DnD5e: Add flavour text to prompts
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Settings_Flavour5e_Hint: (requires reload) Add the roll's flavour text to the prompt. This may conflict with other Roll overhaul modules like Quick Rolls.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Reload_Content: You changed the forced manual rolls setting which needs the page to be reloaded.
DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.FVTTAppError: You cannot use DF Manual Rolls inside the FoundryVTT Desktop App. Please use a browser when playing to use this feature.
